main.name: Brian Quach
main.description: People describe me as hardworking, curious, motivated. I strive for success in every situation
main.bio: Hey I'm Brian! I studied Computer Science at the University of Toronto. I have experience in web development, android development, and scalable computing.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: I specialized in Computer Science focusing in Scalable Computing, Operating Systems, and Web Development.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Created a website related to fulfillment operations.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Added features to the Google Search App on Android devices.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Created OAuth 2.0 Authentication and Account management.

testimonials.text: Within 2 weeks, Brian went from not knowing how the OAuth 2.0 Authentication System works to teaching our team how to build it into our website. He is driven and curious. He would be an asset to any team.
testimonials.user: Samin Khan, CTO of Animo AI

testimonials.text: Working with Brian is always a pleasure. He helped me prepare for my interviews at Amazon
testimonials.user: Jimmy Tan, Software Engineer at Amazon

testimonials.text: Brian is an exceptional teammate whose attention to detail and problem solving make him a valued member on any team. Whenever I have worked with him, he's ensured that we always put out our best work. Brian was also a great help in the interview process, where his prior experiences interviewing at top companies provided me the skills and confidence I needed to land a position at Amazon.
testimonials.user: Saim Ibrahim, Software Engineer at Amazon

testimonials.text: Brian has been both a confidant and a mentor to me all throughout my university life. The advice he gave me directly lead to my post-secondary success.
testimonials.user: Arjun Pandher, Student at University of Toronto
